Package it.polimi.ingsw.utils.cardFactories

Class AbstractCardFactory<Element>

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.cardFactories.AbstractCardFactory<Element>
Type Parameters:
Element - is the "type" of Card that will be produced
Direct Known Subclasses:
GoldCardFactory, ObjectiveCardFactory, ResourceCardFactory, StartCardFactory
public abstract class AbstractCardFactory<Element> extends Object
The interface implemented by all concrete factory to load cards from Json
